abi_new_player_onboarding_abi_info_2: 讓Pokémon GO定期確認你的聯絡人一覽表，就能輕鬆邀請朋友一起玩遊戲。你隨時都可以從「設定」關閉此功能。

boosted_mega_pokemon_slowbro: 超級呆殼獸變得更加強大！
change_banned_name_dialog: 嘿，你的暱稱看起來不太OK。可以請你再選一個嗎？
error_could_not_retrieve_more_username_s: 無法顯示候補名稱，請再試一次
event_mischief_hour_countdown: 惡作劇馬上就要開始了……
event_season4_research_available: 「不被理解的光怪陸離」特殊調查已開放
event_season4_research_complete_bonus: 完成「不被理解的光怪陸離」特殊調查，獲得參加季末活動的權利
event_seasonal_eggs: 蛋中將可孵出季節的寶可夢
event_seasonal_wild: 季節的寶可夢出現在地圖上
evolve_best_buddy_confirmation: 你要讓正港好夥伴 {0} 進化嗎？
evolved_too_strong_may: 這隻寶可夢可能會超過部分聯盟的參賽CP限制
evolved_too_strong_some: 這隻寶可夢將超過部分聯盟的參賽CP限制
gbl_quadruple_dust_win: 在GO對戰聯盟獲勝時的星星沙子增為4倍
general1.ticket.2_description:
一張可以獲得八月社群日特殊調查的入場券。不論你身處世界何處，你都可以使用這張入場券在當地時間2021年8月14～15日11:00～17:00時領取八月社群日特殊調查「 你的選擇」。詳情請至遊戲內快訊確認。

 請務必在上述活動時間內參與，以取得活動獎勵。
general1.ticket.2_eevet_description:
一張可以獲得八月社群日特殊調查的入場券。不論你身處世界何處，你都可以使用這張入場券在當地時間2021年8月14～15日11:00～17:00時領取八月社群日特殊調查「 你的選擇」。詳情請至遊戲內快訊確認。

 請務必在上述活動時間內參與，以取得活動獎勵。
general1.ticket.2_oshat_description:
A ticket to access the "From Scalchops to Seamitars" Special Research from September 19, 2021, at 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are. Details can be found in the in-game News.

 YOU MUST PLAY DURING THE SPECIFIED TIME TO RECEIVE ALL THE SPECIAL EVENT BONUSES.
gift_pokestop_guaranteed: 旋轉寶可夢轉盤時一定可以獲得禮物
gofest2021_day2: Pokémon GO Fest 2021 Day 2: 團體戰！
incense_effectiveness_walking: 步行時薰香的效果將會增強
item_event_ticket_pink_desc: 只要擁有這張入場券，不論你身在何處，都能在當地時間8月14~15日11:00～17:00獲得特殊調查的課題。
item_event_ticket_pink_details: 入場券將會自動啟用，不論你在何處都能在當地時間2021年8月14 ~15日活動時間內領取特殊調查。
item_event_ticket_pink_eevet_desc: 只要擁有這張入場券，不論你身在何處，都能在當地時間8月14~15日11:00～17:00獲得特殊調查的課題。
item_event_ticket_pink_eevet_details: 入場券將會自動啟用，不論你在何處都能在當地時間2021年8月14 ~15日活動時間內領取特殊調查。
item_event_ticket_pink_oshat_desc: 只要擁有這張入場券，不論你身在何處，都能在當地時間2021年9月19日11:00～17:00獲得特殊調查的課題。
item_event_ticket_pink_oshat_details: 入場券將會自動啟動。不論你身在何處，都可以在當地時間2021年9月19日的活動時間內領取特殊調查課題。
leader_map_assembled_description: 收集神秘零件，拼湊成火箭隊雷達！用它來找出GO火箭隊藏身之處吧！
lure_rainy_event_bonus: 雨露誘餌模組將吸引活動寶可夢
photobomb_five_eevee: 伊布將在GO Snapshot中驚喜現身5次
photobomb_five_oshawott: 5 Photobombs from Oshawott in GO Snapshot
poi_category_optional_prompt: 輸入複數類別時請以逗號隔開
poi_close_toast: 此寶可夢將會在 {0: hh:mm tt} 關閉
poi_contrib_edit_category_added: {0} more category submission(s) will be added tomorrow.
poi_contrib_edit_category_avail: You have {0} category submission(s) available today.
poi_contrib_edit_category_maxed: You have reached your max daily category submission(s) of {0}.
poi_contrib_upload_later_msg: 做好上傳的準備後，請前往主選單畫面
poi_contrib_upload_now_msg: 稍後你將會收到一封確認信
poi_power_g_level: 謝謝你的投稿！你和鄰近的訓練家將能從此道館獲得獎勵。
poi_power_g_level_body: 謝謝你的投稿！你和鄰近的訓練家將能從此道館獲得獎勵。
poi_power_mainmenu: 做好上傳的準備後，請開啟主選單。
poi_power_p_level: 謝謝你的投稿！你和鄰近的訓練家將能從此寶可補給站獲得獎勵。
poi_power_p_level_body: 謝謝你的投稿！你和鄰近的訓練家將能從此寶可補給站獲得獎勵。
poi_power_turorial_1: 只要掃描此寶可補給站或提供其照片，就能增加位置點數。等級提升後，就能獲得更多獎勵。
poi_power_turorial_2: 寶可補給站等級提升後，將可獲得以下獎勵。
poi_power_turorial_7: 和夥伴一起拜訪該地點並旋轉轉盤時，你的夥伴將能獲得一顆心心！
poi_power_turorial_8: 野生寶可夢在寶可補給站附近出現的機率將會提高；在團體戰中獲勝時，將能獲得更多紀念球。
poi_power_tutorial_1: 只要掃描此地點或提供其照片，就能增加位置點數。等級提升後，就能獲得更多獎勵。
poi_power_tutorial_7: 當你帶著夥伴一起拜訪該地點並旋轉轉盤時，你的夥伴將能獲得一顆心心！
poi_power_tutorial_8: 野生寶可夢在寶可補給站附近出現的機率將會提高；在團體戰中獲勝時，將能獲得更多紀念球。
poi_power_upload_point: 已將 {0} 位置點數加至寶可補給站／道館
poi_powered_up_duration: 強化將持續到 {0:ddd hh:mm tt}
pokemon_info_evolution_failed: 發生不明錯誤，無法讓 {0} 進化
pokemon_info_mega_evolution_really_confi: 你真的要讓 {0} 進行超級進化嗎？
pokestop_spin_new_xp_ten: 第一次訪問的寶可補給站可獲得的XP增為10倍
pokestop_spin_new_xp_three: 第一次訪問的寶可補給站可獲得的XP增為3倍
pups_tutorial_p0_body: 掃描地點後就能增加其位置點數。強化該地點、讓它的等級提升後，它就能為鄰近訓練家提供更多獎勵。
pups_tutorial_p1_body: Get bonuses from powered-up PokéStops and Gyms! Each level has different bonuses.
pups_tutorial_p2_body: 旋轉寶可補給站或道館的轉盤時，有機會為該寶可補給站或道館增加位置點數。
pups_tutorial_p3_body: With this feature, you can scan PokéStops and Gyms by walking around their real-world locations and recording videos with your smart device. These scans will contribute to the creation of 3D maps of those locations.
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_1: 你有看到進化寶可夢伊布大量出現嗎！？
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_2: 有些研究者認為解開寶可夢進化之謎的關鍵，就是伊布的基因。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_3: 我覺得這是可以理解的，畢竟伊布牠能進化成8種形態！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_5: 我只有一套白袍，去哪裡都是這個打扮……
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_6: 欸別管我怎樣了，我們要好好觀察伊布，搞不好能從中找到寶可夢進化的祕密也說不定！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_0_7: 現在就出門去做調查吧！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_1: 接下來要調查的，是在關都地區找到的
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_2: 水屬性水伊布、電屬性雷伊布和火屬性火伊布。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_3: 伊布居然能進化成這麼多種形，真是太驚人了！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_1_4: 我也想跟你一起好好觀察觀察伊布呢！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%，做得好！看來你找到水伊布、雷伊布和火伊布了呢！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_1: 牠們都是很了不得的寶可夢，
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_2: 你知道水伊布的身體細胞結構與水分子相似，所以牠能和水融為一體嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_3: 不然你知道雷伊布能吐出約10000伏特的高壓電嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_4: 還是你知道火伊布能將吸入的空氣轉化成攝式1700度的火焰嗎？
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_5: 而且牠們全都是從伊布進化而來的！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_6: 也許除了基因之外，還有其他因素讓牠能進化成這麼多種形態？
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_7: 來自城都地區的超能力屬性太陽伊布和惡屬性月亮伊布只會在特定時間進化。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_2_8: 希望你能在做調查的路上遇見牠們！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_0: %PLAYERNAME%，你真是太棒了！你找到太陽伊布和月亮伊布了！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_1: 超能力屬性太陽伊布能透過感受空氣的流動，準確地預測出接下來的天氣和對手的行動。伊布通常會在白天進化成太陽伊布。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_2: 到了晚上，伊布有機會進化成惡屬性月亮伊布。據說在滿月的夜裡，月亮伊布身上圈圈一樣的花紋會發出金黃色的光芒。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_3: 居然會有寶可夢只能在特定時間進化成特定形態！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_4: 寶可夢的世界真是博大精深，充滿了秘密！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_5: 我們繼續去探索伊布的進化形態吧，接下來是神奧地區。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_6: 草屬性葉伊布和冰屬性冰伊布來自神奧地區，據說牠們是為了適應特定的環境而進化。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_3_7: 接下來就拜託你去調查牠們了。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_1: 看來你已經找到葉伊布和冰伊布了呢！恭喜！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_2: 神奧地區的環境讓適應能力極高的伊布進化成草屬性和冰屬性的寶可夢。這隻寶可夢的適應能力真是太強大了！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_3: 也許我們今天無法解開寶可夢進化的秘密，但我們從牠身上學到了很多事情！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_4: 從牠身上，我們能學到我們所做的每一個選擇都是很重要的。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_5: 我希望你能從伊布身上學到如何做出最適合自己的選擇。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_6: 不過我這個老傢伙的嘮叨就到此為止，接下來要請你去調查妖精屬性的仙子伊布。牠來自卡洛斯地區。
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_7: 這隻寶可夢會從蝴蝶結般的觸角裡釋放能夠消除敵意的波動，藉此平息紛爭。據說伊布和訓練家的友情和彼此之間的信賴超越某個等級時，牠就會進化成仙子伊布。這真是太感人了！
quest_special_dialogue_eevet_4_8: 我希望你很快就能見到仙子伊布！
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I came across a truly surprising sight recently while going for a walk—trees in the nearby forest were covered with slash marks!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_1: I’ve heard of a Pokémon called Oshawott, the Sea Otter Pokémon, that can detach the scalchop on its stomach for use as a blade. Maybe the slash marks were caused by all of the Oshawott nearby?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_0_2: Let's use this as an opportunity to go and catch some of those Oshwott so we can find out more!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_0: Hey %PLAYERNAME%! Did you know that Oshawott doesn't just use the scalchop on its stomach to fight, but that it can be used to break open hard berries as well?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_1: Maybe we can learn even more about Oshawott once it evolves into its next Evolution: Dewott! Don’t let its cute exterior fool you—Dewott takes itself very seriously.
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_1_2: Also known as the Discipline Pokémon, this little fella uses strict training to learn its flowing double-scalchop technique. I’d love to see Dewott’s fighting in action!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_0: Wow, Dewott's double-scalchop technique is amazing! Aren’t Pokémon so curious, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_1: I barely have the coordination to rub my tummy and pat my head at the same time and we have creatures that have their own special battle techniques. Truly inspiring stuff!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_2: I’m starting to understand a bit more about this Pokémon now. And I have an inkling that we’ll get to learn even more soon!
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_3: It’s Evolution, Samurott, apparently uses swords incorporated in its armor called seamitars. Apparently in the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_2_4: Sounds like it’s a true master of its craft! No wonder it’s known as the Formidable Pokémon! Let’s evolve Dewott and see this mastery for ourselves, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_3_0: Well would you look at that, %PLAYERNAME%, a Samurott in the flesh! It’s seamitars truly are a sight to behold. Knowing it can draw and sheathe its blades in a blink of an eye, I wonder how fast it can dice up berries...
quest_special_dialogue_oshat_3_1: Thanks for all your help today, %PLAYERNAME%. We’ve learned so much about Oshawott, Dewott, and Samurott—and from them too! I’ll SEA you next time! Ha-ha!
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_0: 嘿，%PLAYERNAME%！你有沒有感覺到全新冒險即將開始啊？
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_1: 你還記得之前出現在天空的那些圓環嗎？那些都是頑童寶可夢胡帕弄出來的。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_2: 我跟你說，我最近用薰香吸引寶可夢的時候，有隻手突然從我頭上伸出來……
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_3: 然後我的眼鏡就這樣被搶走了！！跟我一起做實驗的史帕克也驚呆了。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_4: 還好他跟坎迪拉立刻回過神，幫我把眼鏡追討回來。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_5: 沒錯，兇手就是胡帕！我知道追查這隻寶可夢不容易，但有你的幫忙，我想一定能進行得更順利！
quest_special_dialogue_season4_0_6: 我想請你用薰香吸引一下附近的寶可夢，看看能捉到什麼。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_0: 對了，有件事要先提醒你。接下來的研究過程中，我可能會需要單獨去做一些事前調查。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_1: 你放心去做你的調查吧。
quest_special_dialogue_season4_1_2: 找到有關胡帕的消息之後，我會盡快通知你的。%PLAYERNAME%，萬事拜託囉。
quest_under_investigation: 維羅博士正在進行調查。請稍後再回來看看他的最新進度！
quest_use_any_potion: Use any Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_hyper_potion: Use a Hyper Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_max_potion: Use a Max Potion on a Pokémon
quest_use_super_potion: Use a Super Potion on a Pokémon
safari_2020_dialogue_1_2a: Why not take the time to bond with your buddy?
spawn_eevee: 更多伊布出現在地圖上
spawn_oshawott: More Oshawott are appearing in the wild
ticket_eevee: 特殊調查「你的選擇」的入場券在商店中上架
ticket_oshawott: Ticket for Special Research story available in the Shop: From Scalchops to Seamitars
tips_battle_at_gyms_tutorial_body: You can claim a Gym controlled by a rival team by defeating the Pokémon in the Gym. If you reduce the motivation of all Pokémon in the Gym to zero, you’ll be able to claim the Gym for your team.
tips_gym_pokecoins_tutorial_body:
Earn up to 50 PokéCoins per day when your Pokémon defends a Gym.

You’ll earn these PokéCoins when your Pokémon returns from defending the Gym.
tips_loading_screen_battle_switch_charge: 你可以試著在對戰時替換寶可夢，使出有效的特殊攻擊
tips_loading_screen_curveball_chance: 曲球將讓捕捉寶可夢變得更簡單
tips_loading_screen_daily_raid_pass: 只要旋轉道館轉盤，每天都能獲得一張免費的團體戰入場券
tips_loading_screen_discard_all_items: 開啟包包畫面，點擊垃圾桶圖示＞彈跳視窗畫面左方的「-」後，便可將該道具全數丟棄
tips_loading_screen_evolve_knocked_out: 如果讓瀕死的寶可夢進化，牠的HP將在進化後完全恢復
tips_loading_screen_friendship_lucky_egg: 提升友誼等級可獲得的XP將可透過使用幸運蛋來加倍
tips_loading_screen_golden_razz_gym: 餵道館的寶可夢吃金色蔓莓果，讓牠們的體力完全回復。
tips_loading_screen_raid_egg_hatch: 通常團體戰的參賽者數會在道館上的蛋剛孵化的那一瞬間衝上高峰
tips_loading_screen_raid_party_prep: 列出你的對戰小組陣容，為團體戰做好準備
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_intro_0: Looks like your Pokémon fainted. Here are some Potions and Revives that you can use to restore your Pokémon’s HP.
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_intro_1: To use these items, open your Item Bag. Hope you find them helpful, {0}! Let’s take care of our Pokémon, just like they take care of us.
tips_potion_revive_tutorial_outro_0: Collect more Potions and Revives by winning Raid Battles and spinning Photo Discs at PokéStops and Gyms!
tips_potion_tutorial_0: Your work doesn’t stop there. You should get your Pokémon to full HP!
tips_potion_tutorial_1: You can use Potions to restore the HP of your Pokémon.
tips_potion_tutorial_2: When using Potions, tap on a Pokémon to restore its HP.
tips_potion_tutorial_3: Just like new! Seeing a Pokémon feel better is one of my favorite things.
tips_potion_tutorial_select_item_toast: Use your Potions to restore the HP of your Pokémon.
tips_potion_tutorial_use_item_toast: Tap on a Pokémon to restore its HP.
tips_raid_tutorial_charged_attack_body: Once your attack meter is full, tap the button to perform a Charged Attack, which can deal a lot of damage.
tips_raid_tutorial_difficulty_body:
The icon indicates a raid’s difficulty. Work with other Trainers to defeat more challenging Raid Bosses!

If you defeat a Mega Raid Boss, you’ll get Mega Energy that you can use to Mega Evolve that Pokémon.
tips_raid_tutorial_dodge_body: Swipe to the left or right to dodge incoming attacks from the opponent.
tips_revive_tutorial_0: Use a Revive on a fainted Pokémon to restore half its maximum HP.
tips_revive_tutorial_select_item_toast: Use Revives to revive fainted Pokémon.
tips_revive_tutorial_use_item_toast: Tap on your fainted Pokémon to help revive them.
tips_tagging_tutorial_body_0: 你可以為你的寶可夢加上標籤，整理寶可夢盒時將更有效率。
tips_tagging_tutorial_body_1: 譬如說你可以用這樣的標籤
two_free_raid_passes: 每天旋轉道館轉盤最多可獲得兩張免費團體戰入場券
username_suggestion_name_looks_good_chan:
看起來不錯！
（暱稱只能更改1次）
username_suggestion_name_looks_good_new_:
看起來不錯！
（暱稱之後也可以修改）
wayfarer_eligible_body: 恭喜你獲得了參加Niantic Wayfarer的資格！你可以透過Niantic Wayfarer提供世界各地名勝景點資訊，讓Niantic的遊戲更加有趣。趕快完成Wayfarer的訓練課程，解鎖申請新寶可補給站及編輯寶可補給站的功能吧！
wayfarer_eligible_unlock_msg: 完成Wayfarer的訓練課程來解鎖吧！
